    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15167</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Il Parlamento Europeo</string>
            <string language="en">The European Parliament</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Europäische Parlament</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Parlement européen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Parliament Europeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Ευρωπαϊκό Κοινοβούλιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Parlamento Europeo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Questo LO aiuta ad insegnare come il Parlamento Europeo funziona. Si tratta di un esercizio di completamento con un bottone "Controlla", per un semplice controllo sulle risposte, un bottone "Suggerimento", per ottenere una lettera di suggerimento se la parola crea problemi e un bottone con "Punto di domanda", per ottenere un aiuto. Notare che i punti accumulati saranno persi se vengono richiesti suggerimenti o aiuti. Le definizioni valutano la conoscenza degli studenti sul Parlamento Europeo, chiedendo loro di riempire i quindici spazi vuoti sui seguenti nove argomenti: 1. Il Parlamento che  rappresenta i cittadini ed è il protagonista dei processi legislativi 2. Elezioni dei Membri del Parlamento Europeo 3. Numero dei MPE 4. Data delle elezioni del Parlamento attuale 5. Differenti numeri dei MPE per nazione 6. Città dove si svolgono sessioni plenarie e suppletive 7. Responsabilità condivise con il Consiglio dell'Unione Europea 8. Democrazia e controllo 9. Influenza sulla vita quotidiana dei cittadini</string>
            <string language="en">This LO helps teaching how the European Parliament works.  It is a fill in the gaps exercise provided with a "Check" button, for an easy control over answers, a "Hint" button to get a free letter if a word is giving trouble and a “Question mark” button to get a clue. Note that points will be lost if hints or clues are requested.

The definitions test students’ knowledge on the European Parliament asking them to fill in fifteen gaps on the following nine subjects:
1.	Parliament representing citizens and being the protagonist of the legislative process
2.	elections of MEPs 
3.	number of MEPs
4.	date of election of present Parliament
5.	different numbers of  MEPs per country
6.	EU cities where plenary sessions and additional ones take place
7.	responsibility shared with the Council of the European Union
8.	democracy and control
9.	influence on citizens’ everyday life</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Parlamento Europeo</string>
            <string language="en">European Parliament</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Commissione Europea</string>
            <string language="en">European Commission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">Consiglio</string>
            <string language="en">Council</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">legislation</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">legislative process</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="it">elezioni</string>
            <string language="en">elections</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="it">MPE</string>
            <string language="en">MEPs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">numero dei MPE</string>
            <string language="en">number of MEPs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">date</string>
            <string language="en">dates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">elezioni del Parlamento</string>
            <string language="en">elections of Parliament</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">responsabilità</string>
            <string language="en">responsibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">democrazia</string>
            <string language="en">democracy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">responsabilità condivise</string>
            <string language="en">sharing responsibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses NIEDRIGE Hilfen, die unterrichten, wie das 
Europäische Parlament arbeitet. Es ist ausfüllen die Abstände
trainiert versehen mit einer "Überprüfung" Taste, für eine einfache
Steuerung über Antworten, einer "Tip" Taste, um ein freies Zeichen zu
erhalten, wenn ein Wort Mühe und eine?Question Markierung gibt? 
knöpfen Sie, um einen Anhaltspunkt zu erhalten. Beachten 
Sie, daß Punkte verloren sind, wenn Tips oder Anhaltspunkte 
requested.The Definitionen Testkursteilnehmer sind? Wissen auf 
dem Europäischen Parlament, das sie bittet, fünfzehn Abstände auf 
den folgenden neun subjects:1 auszufüllen. Parlament, das 
Bürger darstellt und der Protagonist der gesetzgebenden process2. 
Wahlen MEPs 3. der Zahl des MEPs4. Datums der Wahl von den anwesenden 
Parliament5. unterschiedlichen Anzahlen von MEPs pro country6 ist. 
EU-Städte, in denen Plenarsitzungen und die zusätzliche die 
place7. Verantwortlichkeit nehmen, die mit dem Rat der europäischen 
Union8. Demokratie und des control9. Einflusses auf Bürger geteilt 
wird? tägliche Lebensdauer</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce BASSES aides enseignant comment le Parlement 
européen travaille. C'est un compléter les lacunes s'exercent 
fourni en bouton de "contrôle", pour un contrôle facile des 
réponses, bouton de "conseil" pour recevoir une lettre libre si un 
mot donne l'ennui et une marque de ?Question ? boutonnez pour 
obtenir un indice. Notez que des points seront détruits si les 
conseils ou les indices sont des étudiants d'essai de définitions de
requested.The ? la connaissance sur le Parlement européen les 
demandant de compléter quinze lacunes sur les neuf subjects:1 
suivants. Le Parlement représentant des citoyens et étant le 
protagoniste des élections législatives de process2. du nombre de 
MPE 3. de date de MEPs4. de l'élection de différents nombres actuels
de Parliament5. de MPE par country6. Villes d'EU où les 
sessions plénières et les supplémentaires prennent la 
responsabilité de place7. partagée avec le Conseil de la démocratie
européenne d'Union8. et de l'influence de control9. sur des citoyens 
? vie quotidienne</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este ajudas BAIXAS que ensinam como o parliament 
europeu trabalha. É uma suficiência nas aberturas exercita 
fornecido com uma tecla da "verificação", para um controle fácil 
sobre respostas, uma tecla da "sugestão" para começar uma letra 
livre se uma palavra estiver dando o problema e uma marca do?Question?
abotoe para começar um indício. Anote que os pontos 
estarão perdidos se as sugestões ou os indícios forem estudantes do
teste das definições de requested.The? conhecimento no 
parliament europeu que pede que preencham quinze aberturas nos 
seguintes nove subjects:1. Parliament que representa cidadãos e
que é o protagonist das eleições legislativas de process2. do 
número dos MEPs 3. da data de MEPs4. da eleição dos números 
diferentes atuais de Parliament5. dos MEPs por country6. Cidades
do EU onde as sessões plenary e as adicionais fazem exame da 
responsabilidade de place7. compartilhada com o conselho da democracia
européia de Union8. e da influência de control9. em cidadãos? 
vida diária</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το LO βοηθά πώς το Ευρωπαϊκό Κοινοβούλιο 
εργάζεται. Είναι μια αφθονία στην άσκηση χασμάτων που 
παρέχεται σε ένα κουμπί "ελέγχου", για έναν εύκολο έλεγχο των 
απαντήσεων, ένα κουμπί "υπαινιγμού" για να πάρει μια ελεύθερη 
επιστολή εάν μια λέξη δίνει το πρόβλημα και ένα σημάδι 
?Question; κουμπί για να πάρει μια ένδειξη. 
Σημειώστε ότι τα σημεία θα χαθούν εάν οι υπαινιγμοί ή οι 
ενδείξεις ζητούνται Οι ορισμοί εξετάζουν τους σπουδαστές; 
γνώση σχετικά με το Ευρωπαϊκό Κοινοβούλιο που ζητά τους 
για να συμπληρώσει δεκαπέντε χάσματα στα ακόλουθα εννέα 
subjects:1. Το Κοινοβούλιο που αντιπροσωπεύει τους πολίτες
και που είναι ο πρωταγωνιστής των νομοθετικών εκλογών process2.
των ευρωβουλευτών 3. αριθμός ημερομηνίας MEPs4. της εκλογής των
παρόντων διαφορετικών αριθμών Parliament5. των ευρωβουλευτών 
ανά country6. Πόλεις της ΕΕ όπου οι ολομέλειες και 
πρόσθετοι παίρνουν την ευθύνη place7. κοινή με το Συμβούλιο 
της ευρωπαϊκών δημοκρατίας Union8. και της επιρροής 
control9. στους πολίτες; καθημερινή ζωή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este ayudas BAJAS que enseñan cómo el Parlamento 
Europeo trabaja. ¿Es un completar los boquetes ejercita 
proporcionado un botón del "cheque", para un control fácil sobre 
respuestas, un botón de la "indirecta" para conseguir una carta libre
si una palabra está dando apuro y una marca del?Question? 
abotone para conseguir una pista. ¿Observe que las puntas 
serán perdidas si las indirectas o las pistas son estudiantes de la 
prueba de las definiciones de requested.The? conocimiento en el 
Parlamento Europeo que pide que completen quince boquetes en los nueve
subjects:1 siguientes. El parlamento que representa a los 
ciudadanos y que es el protagonista de las elecciones legislativas de 
process2. del número de los MEPs 3. de la fecha de MEPs4. de la 
elección de actuales diversos números de Parliament5. de los MEPs 
por country6. ¿Ciudades del EU en donde las sesiones plenarias y
las adicionales toman la responsabilidad de place7. compartida con el 
consejo de la democracia europea de Union8. y de la influencia de 
control9. en ciudadanos? vida diaria</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-t-lre">14-U</string>
            <string language="en">> 14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Obiettivi didattici e pedagogici. Gli studenti rinnoveranno la loro conoscenza del modo in cui il Parlamento Europeo lavora, imparando i concetti di base che riguardano questa fondamentale istituzione dell' U.E. Campo d'azione dell'approccio pedagogico: 14-25. Tempo: 45 minuti. Procedura: gli studenti possono lavorare individualmente, a coppie o gruppi di 3-4. Devono leggere tutto l'esercizio una volta. Poi lo leggono di nuovo e cominciano a riempire gli spazi, usando i bottoni "controlla, suggerimento e/o punto di domanda" se hanno bisogno di aiuto. Questo LO può essere usato da altri insegnanti in molti modi differenti secondo la situazione didattica, gli obiettivi, gruppi di età, pre-conoscenze, numero di alunni nella classe, numero dei computer nel laboratorio, tempo di esecuzione, ecc.</string>
            <string language="en">Instructional and Pedagogical Objectives

Students will revise their knowledge on the way the European Parliament works, learning about the basic facts concerning this fundamental institution of the E.U.

 Pedagogical Approach

Age range: 14-25
Timing     : 45 minutes.
The procedure :
students can work individually, in pairs or in groups of 3-4. They go through all the passage once. Then they read it again and start filling the gaps in using the check, hint and/or question mark button if they need help. This LO may be used by other teachers in many different ways depending on their teaching situation, their objective, age group, previous knowledge, number of students in the class, number of computers in the lab, given timing etc</string>
          </description>
        </educational>

          </description>
        </rights>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
